<p>We had planned to make a Arduino Controlled Rubiks Cube Solver. The basic idea of the project was to solve the rubiks cube automatically given from any random position . We have used stepper and servo motors in the mechanical design of the bot to solve the cube. The mechanical design has four arms which can move the faces of the cube and can hold or release the cube.</p><p><img name="imgthumb1" src="data:image/jpeg;base64," height="107" style="margin-top:0px;margin-right:-13px;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:-9px" title="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TDes0lN6k_M" width="143" class="iuth" alt="Image result for yellow cube machine images" align="middle" border="0"></p>
